类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component (implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable)
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent (implements java.io.Serializable)
          • javax.swing.JLabel (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants)

              • gamecontroller.ContinentNodeRenderer
              • gamecontroller.CountryNodeRenderer
              • gamecontroller.PlayerNodeRenderer
        • java.awt.Window (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible)
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants)
              • gamecontroller.FortificationPhaseView
              • gamecontroller.putInitialArmyView
              • gamecontroller.ReinforcePhaseView
              • gamecontroller.TradeInCards
          • java.awt.Frame (implements java.awt.MenuContainer)
            • javax.swing.JFrame (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants)
              • gamecontroller.PhaseView (implements java.util.Observer)
              • gamecontroller.RiskGameMain
    • gamecontroller.MatrixRenderer (implements javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer)
    • gamecontroller.putInitialArmyView.ButtonHandler (implements java.awt.event.ActionListener)
